ReferencesAndLinks: Horikawa, T., Cowen, A.S., Keltner, D., Kamitani, Y., The neuralrepresentation of visually evoked emotion is high-dimensional, categorical, and distributed acrosstransmodal brain regions, ISCIENCE (2020), doi: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.isci.2020.101060

Name: Visual image reconstruction from human brain activity during selective attention unveils subjective visual images
